name: Sprouting Thorns
description: You cause thorns to sprout on a very close (5 unit) creature's armor or skin for the next minute. Whenever this creature is hit by a brawling or melee attack that uses a body part instead of a weapon, the attacking creature takes 4 physical damage.
charge: The thorns cannot be mitigated to 0 damage, and instead always deal at least 2 physical damage.
